about.title: About Me
about.heading: I don't just write code. I build smart systems.
about.p1: I'm Dusko Licanin, a full-stack developer based in Banja Luka, specializing in modern web and mobile applications. I leverage AI-optimized workflows to accelerate development without compromising quality.
about.p2: I offer complete web development, mobile app development (iOS/Android), and custom SaaS solutions for clients. I work with React and Flutter frameworks, backed by Supabase and Firebase for scalable infrastructure.
about.p3: Whether you need a marketing website, business application, or full SaaS platform — I deliver quality code twice as fast as traditional development thanks to AI-powered tools.
about.why_me: Why me? Because you need a technical partner who understands both code and business velocity.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before we start.

items.q: Why choose custom development over WordPress?
items.a: WordPress is fine for blogs, but it's slow and vulnerable. I build custom web applications (React/Next.js) that are secure, load instantly, and rank better on Google.
It means efficiency. I use AI tools to automate boilerplate coding, leaving me more time to focus on your business logic and design. You get a better product, faster.

items.q: How much does a project cost?
items.a: Every project is unique. However, thanks to AI tools saving my time, I can offer premium agency quality at a more accessible price point. Contact me for an estimate.

items.q: Do you work with international clients?
items.a: Absolutely. Based in Banja Luka, I work as a Full Stack Developer for clients worldwide, delivering 'Silicon Valley' quality code remotely.
Yes. Software needs care. I offer maintenance packages to keep your application secure and up-to-date.

bookbed-saas.title: BookBed SaaS
bookbed-saas.tagline: A centralized reservation management engine that syncs global booking channels in real-time.
bookbed-saas.challenge_text: Property managers face a major issue: calendar fragmentation. Managing availability across multiple OTAs manually leads to costly double-bookings. The goal was to create a single-source-of-truth system to automate operations.
bookbed-saas.solution_text: I designed a robust multi-tenant SaaS using Flutter for a fast interface and Firebase for data sync. The core innovation is a custom iCal parsing engine for bidirectional sync. I also integrated Stripe for subscriptions and Resend for transactional emails.

results.title: Bidirectional Sync
results.desc: Complex iCal logic eliminates double bookings instantly.

results.title: Scalable Architecture
results.desc: Cloud Functions isolate data for multiple tenants securely.

ironlife.title: IronLife
ironlife.tagline: A high-performance digital publishing platform optimized for speed, SEO dominance, and content growth.
ironlife.challenge_text: In the fitness market, speed equals trust. The client needed a content-heavy digital ecosystem without sacrificing performance. The main hurdle was operational: the non-tech team needed to publish complex content daily without developer aid.
ironlife.solution_text: I built a custom Webflow solution focused on semantic HTML and high-performance metrics. Using Webflow CMS, I linked dynamic collections, giving the client a powerful no-code dashboard to manage their entire presence.

results.title: 99/100 Performance
results.desc: Near-perfect Lighthouse scores via aggressive optimization.

results.title: SEO Foundation
results.desc: Schema markup and logic-first hierarchy for better ranking.

results.title: Zero-Code Ops
results.desc: Client publishes content 50% faster with a custom CMS.

pizzeria-bestek.title: Pizzeria Bestek
pizzeria-bestek.tagline: A full-stack ordering ecosystem with real-time admin oversight and sub-second data sync.
pizzeria-bestek.challenge_text: Local restaurants lose margin to aggregator apps. The client needed a custom digital ecosystem: a seamless mobile-first ordering experience for customers and a Mission Control dashboard for kitchen staff.
pizzeria-bestek.solution_text: I built a reactive web app with React and Tailwind. The backend uses Supabase (PostgreSQL). I leveraged Supabase Realtime (WebSockets) to push new orders to the Admin Dashboard instantly without page refreshes.

results.title: Sub-Second Latency
results.desc: Orders appear in the kitchen instantly via WebSockets.

results.title: Automated Logistics
results.desc: Programmatic email updates via Resend API.

results.title: Secure Roles
results.desc: Strict Row Level Security (RLS) separates admin and user data.

flutterflow-templates.title: FlutterFlow Marketplace
flutterflow-templates.tagline: A suite of modular, pre-engineered foundations that accelerate development cycles for global builders.
flutterflow-templates.challenge_text: Low-code platforms often lack complex business logic. The market lacked high-quality starting points that handled production-level backend needs, not just visual design.
flutterflow-templates.solution_text: I engineered a library of logic-first templates. This includes booking systems with Cloud Functions and Stripe, and productivity suites with 2-way Google Calendar sync.

results.title: Faster Speed to Market
results.desc: Developers skip weeks of backend coding.

results.title: Modular Design
results.desc: Components can be dropped into any project easily.

results.title: Cross-Platform
results.desc: Flutter engine ensures parity across iOS and Android.
